messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 1395
messages.msgSnippet: **So what happened, Deb? After over a month, I figured they were lost forever in cyber-space.  Now they re back up and seem as good as new. What WAS it?**
messages.messageBody:
**So what happened, Deb?

After over a month, I figured they were lost forever in cyber-space.  Now
they're back up and seem as good as new. What WAS it?**

Kelly,

This is what the webmaster sent me yesterday

***Well, I finally found the problem today; the cgi-bin with the message
board
scripts had the wrong permissions. No scripts in the folder would execute
because of the wrong permissions... Not only did home-ed-magazine.com and
unschooling.com have DIFFERENT permissions, but also the old server was
configured in such a way that it didn't care about this difference. Ughhh...

I finally found the problem today, though. So, it should work now. Please
let me know if it doesn't.

Thanks for your patience.

-Peter***



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
